mapper.insert: insert into order (order_id, goods_id, order_amount, order_status, order_cre_time, order_pay_time, order_send_time, order_cancel_time, order_complete_time, order_log_id, deliver_name, deliver_address, deliver_phone, bs_id, receiver_name, receiver_address, receiver_phone, receiver_code, trans_fare, trans_way) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCreTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderPayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderSendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderCancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transFare,jdbcType=REAL}, #{transWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update order set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_cre_time = #{orderCreTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_pay_time = #{orderPayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_send_time = #{orderSendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_cancel_time = #{orderCancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_complete_time = #{orderCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_log_id = #{orderLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_name = #{deliverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_address = #{deliverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_phone = #{deliverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bs_id = #{bsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_address = #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_code = #{receiverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_fare = #{transFare,jdbcType=REAL}, trans_way = #{transWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, goods_id, order_amount, order_status, order_cre_time, order_pay_time, order_send_time, order_cancel_time, order_complete_time, order_log_id, deliver_name, deliver_address, deliver_phone, bs_id, receiver_name, receiver_address, receiver_phone, receiver_code, trans_fare, trans_way from order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select order_id, goods_id, order_amount, order_status, order_cre_time, order_pay_time, order_send_time, order_cancel_time, order_complete_time, order_log_id, deliver_name, deliver_address, deliver_phone, bs_id, receiver_name, receiver_address, receiver_phone, receiver_code, trans_fare, trans_way from order
